name: table_parser
description: Read CSV or XLSX files and return normalized row data.

file_path.description: Path to the CSV or Excel file inside the project.

sheet_name.description: For Excel files, the sheet to parse (defaults to the first sheet).

max_rows.description: Limit the number of rows returned (default 100).

has_header.description: Treat the first row as column names (default true).
